# Nexero Dashboard - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
Professional VR real estate analytics dashboard for property builders. Displays session data, engagement metrics, heatmaps, and AI predictions from VR property tours.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Recharts for visualizations
- Backend: FastAPI at https://nexero.onrender.com

## Setup Checklist

- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Next.js project
- [ ] Install and configure dependencies
- [ ] Set up shadcn/ui components
- [ ] Create dashboard layout and pages
- [ ] Implement API integration
- [ ] Add data visualizations
- [ ] Configure for production deployment
